DataSource.Query: WITH summary AS ( SELECT inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.store_id, inventory.get_store_name_by_store_id(inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.store_id) AS store_name, inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.item_id, inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.base_unit_id, SUM(CASE WHEN inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.transaction_type = 'Dr' THEN inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.base_quantity ELSE inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.base_quantity * -1 END) AS base_total_quantity FROM inventory.verified_checkout_details_view WHERE store_id = @StoreId OR 0 = @StoreId AND value_date <= @Date GROUP BY inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.store_id, inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.item_id, inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.base_unit_id ) SELECT store_id, store_name, summary.item_id, items.item_code, items.item_name, inventory.convert_unit(base_unit_id, items.unit_id) * base_total_quantity AS quantity, inventory.get_unit_name_by_unit_id(items.unit_id) AS unit, purchase.get_item_cost_price(@OfficeId, summary.item_id, NULL, base_unit_id) * (inventory.convert_unit(base_unit_id, inventory.get_root_unit_id(base_unit_id)) * base_total_quantity) AS amount FROM summary JOIN inventory.items ON summary.item_id = items.item_id ORDER BY store_id, item_id;
